0.2.name: wordpress/superslider-milkbox
0.2.description:
Another pop over light box. Theme based, animated, automatic linking, autoplay slideshow, built with Milkbox2 , uses mootools 1.2 java script. This plugin is part of the SuperSlider series. Get more supersliders at supersliders

Support

If you have any problems or suggestions regarding this plugin please speak up

NOTICE

  • The downloaded folder's name should be superslider-milkbox
  • Also available for download from here.
  • Probably not compatible with plugins which use jquery. (not tested)

Features

  • complete global control from options page
  • full
